titles.title: Reaffirming the robust commitment of the House of Representatives to the importance of the United States-Greek strategic partnership.
Reaffirming the robust commitment of the House of Representatives to the importance of the United States-Greek strategic partnership.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, Energy and the Environment.

committee.subcommittee: Europe, Eurasia, Energy and the Environment
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for relations between the United States and Greece and encourages a collaborative focus by the two countries on specific areas, including defense and energy.
